text:
Hi everyone, I hope you're well :fire:

I've a question about properties. When I want to know the enrichment rate of all properties, I export all the prop and work on a Google Sheet with a `COUNTIF`
Do you know if we can get it with API ?

Thanks :pray:

Hi everyone. I created application at HubSpot and widget which allow make click-to-call. I have several questions:
1. For upload my widget and show at CRM HubSpot i set up url to widget. When somebody use my widget i have to know "who use it" .  Maybe in request from CRM to my service for widget contained token or some identifier of user? Or another way for determine user ?
2. At HubSpot exist workspace or company which contained several users?
For example: i bought paid account at HubSpot. I have some personal workspace (named like my company) where i will able add our agents to crm.
it’s a v1 endpoint and it’ll provide information about the access token.
just remember it counts towards your API limits, so cache it.
Oauth API limits - are they per app, or per app per portal?

Question, I am trying to use the contact API (<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts>) to send the HubSpotutk cookie through so we can have tracking data against the contact in HubSpot. Is this possible?

Hello everyone.
Do exist in the HubSpot CRM some entity like "campaign" ("work space", "company").
For example: i bought paid account for my company "Coca-cola". Added to CRM my agents. Me and all my agents related to one campaign "Coca-cola" and this "campaign" have to has ID. I have to determine via API request this "campaign id" and combine users by this ID
